name: Authorization Transaction Invalid Amount
descriptionHtml:
Request:

POST - http://44.228.71.230/v1/acquiring/process

raw 
  {
  "program_id": "1b1476f8-3b30-4e94-8b8b-e7b312e6d5c8",
  "merchant_id": "016fd8c3-f677-a782-122d-2b55e30c93ce",
  "type": "AUTHORIZATION",
  "amount": .5,
  "currency_code": "USD",
  "reference": "da040abf-314c-41fd-b556-2b1b8a5c9266TEST",
  "stored_payment_instrument": null,
  "payment_instrument": {
    "holder_name": "Frederick Jast",
    "number": "6011208701112222",
    "expiration_date": "2022-04",
    "security_code": "123",
    "billing": {
      "address": {
        "country_code": "USA",
        "country_subdivision_code": "USA-TN",
        "city": "Chattanooga",
        "postal_code": "37402",
        "line1": "1234 East Main Street",
        "line2": "Suite 1000"
      }
    }
  }
}

Response:

500 - Internal Server Error 

  {"error":{"code":"INTERNAL_ERROR","message":null,"errors":null}}
